```{r setup}
library(ggplot2)
library(noradplot)
```

## Scatter plot
```{r}
#| fig.width: 6
#| fig.height: 4
ggnorad("default")

ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy, color = class)) + 
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_norad() +
  labs(title = "This is the title",
       subtitle = "This is the slightly longer subtitle",
       caption = "This is the caption")
```

## Bar chart
```{r}
#| fig.width: 6
#| fig.height: 4
ggnorad("default")

ggplot(mpg, aes(class)) + 
  geom_bar() +
  labs(title = "This is the title",
       subtitle = "This is the slightly longer subtitle",
       caption = "This is the caption")
```
